text: (Iddat avadhiyalli) nivu a mahileyarige sucyavagi vivaha prastapa nididaru (a apekseyannu) nim'molage baccittukondaru, nim'ma mele dosavenilla. Nivu sadyadalle avarodane i visaya prastapisuvirembudannu allahanu ballanu. Eniddaru nivu avarodane (i visayavannu) niyama prakara helabeke horatu, avarige rahasya vagdana madabaradu mattu nirdista avadhiyu (iddat) mugiyuva tanaka nivu vivaha bandhanada nirdhara kaigollabaradu. Nim'ma manadolagiruva vicaragalannu allahanu ballanembudu nimage tilidirali mattu nivu avana (allahana) visayadalli eccaravagiri. Hageye allahanu tumba ksamisuvavanu hagu sanyami embudu nimage tilidirali
